pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tools for Validating 'GeoJSON' // Tools for linting 'GeoJSON'. Includes tools for interacting with the online tool http://geojsonlint.com, the 'Javascript' library 'geojsonhint' (https://www.npmjs.com/package/geojsonhint), and validating against a 'GeoJSON' schema via the 'Javascript' library (https://www.npmjs.com/package/is-my-json-valid). Some tools work locally while others require an internet connection.
